CustomField.description: Field used to store the result of the action matrix
CustomField.label: Action Matrix

value.fullName: Action Low - Continue working and reassess in 2 hours.
value.label: Action Low - Continue working and reassess in 2 hours.

value.fullName: Action Medium - ﻿Pause to contact your Standby TL. You may be able to continue following discussion with your Standby TL and creating a risk mitigation action plan. Please reassess in 1 hour.
value.label: Action Medium - ﻿Pause to contact your Standby TL. You may be able to continue following discussion with your Standby TL and creating a risk mitigation action plan. Please reassess in 1 hour.

value.fullName: Action High - Stop and contact Standby TL. Work should only continue if appropriate to do so with a risk mitigation action plan in place following discussion between Standby TL and Duty Manager. Please reassess in 1 hour.
value.label: Action High - Stop and contact Standby TL. Work should only continue if appropriate to do so with a risk mitigation action plan in place following discussion between Standby TL and Duty Manager. Please reassess in 1 hour.
